title: What is Palette?
description: Palette is a complete and integrated platform that enables organizations to effectively manage the entire lifecycle of any combination of new or existing, simple or complex, small or large Kubernetes environments, whether in a data center or the cloud.

frontMatter.title: What is Palette?
frontMatter.metaDescription: Learn what Spectro Cloud's Palette platform is, and how it reduce the complexities your encounter today with Kubernetes.
